extendedInfo.description: The American School Counselor Association (ASCA) supports school counselors' efforts to help students focus on academic, personal/social and career development so they achieve success in school and are prepared to lead fulfilling lives as responsible members of society. ASCA's annual conference is the premier professional development opportunity for school counselors at the elementary, middle and secondary level.

reviews.comment: Amazing tool. Kudos for ASCA for utilizing this technology. Now I don\'t have to carry around so much paper. I want this for my state conference.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bout time
reviews.comment: Finally an ap that we can use for conferences. If only the others would follow.
reviews.author: A Google User
